text: wlma dakhaluu min 'abwab mutafariqat kama 'amrihim abwhm, ma kan dhlk lydfe qada' allah enhm, wlkn kan shfqt fi nafs yaequb ealayhim 'an tusibahum aleyn, wa'iin yaequb lisahib elm eazim bi'amr dinih ellamh allah lah whyana, wlkn 'akthar alnaas la yaelamun eawaqib al'umur wdqayq alashya', wama yaelamh yaequb -elyh alslam- min 'amr dynh
